metadata.title: CVE-2020-22650 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A memory leak vulnerability in sim-organizer.c of AlienVault Ossim v5 causes a denial of service (DOS) via a system crash triggered by the occurrence of a large number of alarm events.

criterions.comment: ossim package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
